column1: Table 2-4:  Emissions from Energy (MMT CO2 Eq.)[1]

column2: + Does not exceed 0.05 MMT CO2 Eq.

a Emissions from Wood Biomass and Biofuel Consumption are not included specifically in summing energy sector totals. Net carbon fluxes from changes in biogenic carbon reservoirs are accounted for in the estimates for LULUCF.
b Emissions from International Bunker Fuels are not included in totals.
Note: Totals may not sum due to independent rounding.

column1: [1] The full time series data is available in Common Reporting Format (CRF) Tables included in the U.S. UNFCCC submission and in CSV format available at https://www.epa.gov/ghgemissions/inventory-us-greenhouse-gas-emissions-and-sinks.
